quest.name: A New Path of Resistance
journal:
Zlatan is ready to see you on your way once more.
※Changing classes or jobs will prevent progress during this quest.

While relieved to know the Bozjan ruins are not the only place where antiquities made of aetherial siltstone may be found, Zlatan is no less discomfited knowing the arduous task of procuring them must fall to you. Gerolt is confident that fifteen relics should suffice for your plans, and so you set out in search of dark, perilous ruins, hoping his guess is on the mark.

※You may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
※Timeworn artifacts can be obtained by completing the raid Delubrum Reginae, or the deep dungeon Palace of the Dead.

You return to Gangos with a hard-earned assortment of artifacts. Loaded into the Allagan node, along with the Resistance weapon, the refinement process thereafter is surprisingly painless. Almost suspiciously so. Zlatan and Gerolt then discuss the feasibility of repeating the refinement process, prompting an equally suspicious recording from the Allagan node, extolling wares from the House of Splendors that would save you the trouble of finding more artifacts, albeit at a price. Zlatan would not forbid you from purchasing from the House of Splendors, but he is understandably keen to avoid any unnecessary dealings with the notoriously unscrupulous Rowena.
objectives: Obtain timeworn artifactsLaw's Order Bastard Sword and Law's Order Kite ShieldLaw's Order KnucklesLaw's Order LabrysLaw's Order SpearLaw's Order Composite BowLaw's Order CaneLaw's Order RodLaw's Order IndexLaw's Order CodexLaw's Order KnivesLaw's Order RevolverLaw's Order ZweihanderLaw's Order AstrometerLaw's Order Samurai BladeLaw's Order RapierLaw's Order ManatriggerLaw's Order ChakramsWith in your inventory or Armoury Chest, deliver the timeworn artifacts to the Allagan node at Gangos.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Who would have thought that the answer to our prayers would be found in ancient pottery of all places?

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: And thanks to the efforts of merchants countless years ago, such relics may be found far beyond the region in which they originated. Considering the present state of Bozja, being able to search for them in other locations may prove beneficial to us.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: I say “us,” but I am afraid the task of procuring them must fall unto you, Blade Surname. Though I dare not ask why, Master Gerolt is quite confident that fifteen artifacts made from aetherial siltstone are likely to contain the requisite amount to coat your Resistance weapon. I trust you know better than I what ruins are worthy of exploration, so I will leave the rest to you. Safe travels.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Come to refine another Resistance weapon? Then we will have need of more aetherial siltstone.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: After your last foray, I trust you know where best to search out the antiquities required, so I will say no more. The node will be ready and waiting for your return.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Timeworn artifacts can be obtained by completing the raid Delubrum Reginae, or the deep dungeon Palace of the Dead.

dialogue.name: MEMORIZESYSTEM
dialogue.text: <blip> <blip> Unable to initiate aetherial siltstone extraction. Please insert artifacts.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Timeworn artifacts can be obtained by completing the raid Delubrum Reginae, or the deep dungeon Palace of the Dead.

dialogue.name: MEMORIZESYSTEM
dialogue.text: <blip> Weapon not found. <blip> Please relinquish weapon to proceed with enhancement.

dialogue.name: MEMORIZESYSTEM
dialogue.text: <blip> <blip> Please insert raw materials to begin aetherial siltstone extraction.

dialogue.name: MEMORIZESYSTEM
dialogue.text:
<blip> Scanning...
<blip> <blip> Aetherial siltstone detected. Please insert weapon.

dialogue.name: MEMORIZESYSTEM
dialogue.text: <blip> Weapon detected. Preparing aetheroinsulation coating.

dialogue.name: MEMORIZESYSTEM
dialogue.text: Weapon aether stabilized. <blip> Please select memories for desired attribute adjustment.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.text: Adjust Resistance weapon attributes.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Inquire about the refinement process.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Nothing.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: By supplying the Allagan node with timeworn artifacts, you may raise the four available attributes of your Resistance weapon as you see fit.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: When you are satisfied with the allotment of attributes, select Allocate to complete the process.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Choose carefully, as redistribution of attributes will require the procurement of additional materials.

dialogue.name: MEMORIZESYSTEM
dialogue.text: <blip> <blip> Scanning registry... Readying memories for extraction...

dialogue.name: MEMORIZESYSTEM
dialogue.text:
<blip> Applying aetheroinsulation coating...
<blip> <blip> Initiating aetheric memory infusion...

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Well, I'll be damned. It worked!

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I'll give the Allagan ball o' bolts credit─any smith worth their hammer'd be proud of a weapon as fine as this. I'll call 'em'er [Error]!

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: I'll give the Allagan ball o' bolts credit─any smith worth their hammer'd be proud of a weapon as fine as this. I'll call 'er [Error]!

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: And what better to partner 'er with than [Error]!

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: 'Course if somethin' ain't right with 'emit, tell it to the node, not me.

dialogue.name: MEMORIZESYSTEM
dialogue.text:
<blip> Warning. <blip> Warning.
Subsequent memory infusions require reapplication of aetheroinsulation coating.

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Meaning Blade Surname would need to acquire more siltstone.

dialogue.name: MEMORIZESYSTEM
dialogue.text: And there is no better place to procure said siltstone than Rowena's House of Splendors!

dialogue.name: MEMORIZESYSTEM
dialogue.text:
Our stalls are stocked with the finest relics, containing high concentrations of aetherial siltstone, which are certain to meet all your weapon forging needs. Visit your nearest House of Splendors representative today, and receive a discount on your first purchase!
If quality is what you seek, then come to Mor Dhona and let Mistress Rowena add a touch of splendor to your life.

dialogue.name: MEMORIZESYSTEM
dialogue.text:
This advertisement was brought to you by Rowena's House of Splendors.
The House of Splendors is not responsible for damages, injury, or painful
death incurred through the use, misuse, or inability to use their products.
Offer is void in the void where prohibited or not prohibited.

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Bloody hell... Is nothing safe from that money-grubbin' witch?

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Guess I should count meself fortunate. 'Least I got to keep me name, unlike the rest o' her bloody underlings. <sigh> Though I reckon she'll come fer that too afore long...

dialogue.name: GEROLT
dialogue.text: Remember, lasslad─if somethin' ain't right with 'emit, tell it to the node, not me.

dialogue.name: MEMORIZESYSTEM
dialogue.text: <blip> Additional aetherial siltstone required for reapplication of aetheroinsulation coating. Artifacts from Rowena's House of Splendors recommended for maximum efficiency. <blip> House of Splendors representatives are standing by!

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: Hmm... That would certainly save you from the undue burden of traveling the world over in search of the requisite antiquities. Of course, that is to say nothing of the payment expected in return...

dialogue.name: ZLATAN
dialogue.text: From what I gather, placing ourselves in their debt, financial or otherwise, would be ill-advised.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Aetherial sealant can be obtained from Auriana at Revenant's Toll or Hismena at Idyllshire.
